articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to February General Steel Enterprise
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to February General Steel Enterprise
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the February General Steel Enterprise.
					 He went round different production processes including the newly built Fireproof Materials Shop and the Room for General Analysis to acquaint himself in detail with the construction and technological updating and production there.
					
					 After seeing the modern Fireproof Materials Shop and the Room for General Analysis furnished with latest equipment, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials, workers and technicians of the enterprise and teachers and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology have successfully completed the projects by their own efforts and with indigenous technology by pooling their creative wisdom and waging a tenacious drive. He highly appreciated their feats.
					
					 Thanks to the painstaking inquiry and devoted efforts of the February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians made up of technicians of the enterprise and teachers and researchers of the university the process of producing firebricks with raw materials available in the country and analyzing process have been updated, making it possible to radically boost the steel production and significantly improve the quality of steel, while cutting down manpower, the use of materials and melting time as much as possible, he said, adding that this signifies a revolution in the nation's steel industry.
					
					 Noting that the teachers and students of Kim Chaek University of Technology are successfully performing a vanguard role in putting industry on a modern and scientific basis, he appreciated the efforts made by them, intensely loyal to the Party and the revolution.
					
					 The enterprise has dynamically pushed forward the work to satisfactorily solve a lot of scientific and technological problems and realize the scientification and modernization of the production processes by paying primary attention to the technical revolution as required by the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science and technology, thereby bringing about a fresh turn in the steel production, he noted, adding that the experience gained by the enterprise goes to prove that the master key to increasing production lies in the technological progress.
					
					 Pointing out that they have waged a dynamic drive to keep production going on at a high rate and attain a higher goal with revolutionary enthusiasm and creative ingenuity even under the situation where they were hard pressed for everything, thus face-lifting the enterprise and making a breakthrough towards increased production in a brief span of time, he emphasized that if all the factories and enterprises use their brain and make persevering efforts to carry out the Party policies just as they did, they can markedly boost the production and give full play to the potential of the Juche-based industry.
					
					 The WPK's line of economic construction which calls for putting the national economy on a Juche, modern and scientific basis has been successfully implemented, the foundation of the independent national economy has grown stronger thanks to the devoted efforts of all the people including workers and intellectuals and the country's industrialization has reached a higher level, he said, adding that thanks to this strong potential the accomplishment of the cause of building a great prosperous powerful nation is fully guaranteed. 
					
					 Noting that it is very important for building an economic power to develop the steel industry, he set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the enterprise.
					
					 He was accompanied by Pak To Chun, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, department director of the C.C., WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, first vice department director of the same, and KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Niger
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Niger
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Mamadou Tandja, President of Niger, Monday on the 50th anniversary of the proclamation of the republic.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished him great successes in his noble work for the unity and stability of the nation and the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Emir of Qatar
articles.content:
Greetings to Emir of Qatar
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Hamad Bin Khalifa Al-Thani, Emir of the States of Qatar, Wednesday on the occasion of its independence day.
					 Expressing the belief that good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests, Kim in the message sincerely wished him good health and happiness and greater successes in his noble work for development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Prime Minister of Qatar
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Qatar
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Sheikh Hamad Bin Jassim Bin Jaber AlÔºçThani, Prime Minister of the Cabinet and Foreign Minister of Qatar, on the occasion of its independence day.
					 The message sincerely wished the people of Qatar fresh progress and prosperity and expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to briskly grow stronger in various fields.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School Tuesday on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Members of the corps paid tribute to the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing at the school.
					
					 They looked round various educational facilities of the school, being briefed on the history of 60 odd years covered by the school under the care of the three generals of Mt. Paektu and on the fact that its students are growing up to be core members of the Workers' Party of Korea and a backbone of the Korean People's Army who would steadfastly succeed to the revolutionary cause.

articles.title: Wreath Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Wreath Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Women of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here Wednesday laid a wreath before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on the occasion of the 91st anniversary of her birth.
					 They placed the wreath before the bust in profound reverence and paid silent tribute to her.
					
					 Seen in the ribbon of the wreath were letters "The revolutionary exploits of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk are immortal!"

articles.title: Film Show Commemorates Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Film Show Commemorates Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A film show for women of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday on the occasion of the 91st birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero.
					 Among those present there were Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union, and officials concerned.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean film "Wait for Me" impressively representing Kim Jong Suk's absolute trust and reverence for President Kim Il Sung, her faith unshakable in any adversity and ardent revolutionary comradeship.

articles.title: Reception Given by Chinese Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Reception Given by Chinese Ambassador to DPRK
Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming on Dec. 16 gave a reception in the run-up to the New Year, Juche 98 (2009.)
					Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, and others. On hand were staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 The participants first watched a CD on which General Secretary Kim Jong Il's visit to the embassy is recorded.
					
					Liu in his speech said that the Korean people have made positive efforts to fling open the gate of a great prosperous powerful nation by successfully implementing tasks set forth in the joint editorial under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and the WPK this year.
					
					 The Chinese people are rejoiced over the achievements made by the Korean people in socialist construction, foreign relations and other fields and sincerely wish them bigger advance in the new year, he noted.
					
					 It is the consistent strategic policy of the Communist Party and the government of China to steadily develop the Sino-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation, he noted, adding that China would promote the development of the relations between the parties of the two countries on the occasion of the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship."
					
					 Choe said in his speech that the Chinese people have registered successes in building a harmonious socialist society based on the principle of people first and governance for the people and a scientific view on development under the leadership of the CPC with Hu Jintao as general secretary.
					
					He wished the Chinese people greater success in their drive for implementing the tasks set forth by the 17th Congress of the CPC in the new year, too.
					
					 He expressed his belief that exchange and cooperation between the two parties and two peoples would grow stronger through the joint efforts of the two sides in the new year.

articles.title: 50th Anniversary of Victory of Revolution in Cuba Marked
articles.content:
50th Anniversary of Victory of Revolution in Cuba Marked
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition took place with due ceremony at the Chollima House of Culture on Wednesday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the victory of the revolution in Cuba.
					 Present there were Vice-chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Jon Yong Jin, officials concerned, working people in the city, Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Galego Montano and his embassy officials here. 
					
					 Diplomatic envoys of different countries here were present there on invitation. 
					
					 Jon in his speech extended warm congratulations and militant salute to the Cuban people on this occasion.
					
					He referred to the fact that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Cuba are growing stronger as the days go by under the deep care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 He extended firm solidarity to the heroic Cuban people steadfastly advancing along the road of socialism. 
					
					 The Cuban ambassador referred to the achievements made by the Cuban people this year, adding that the present reality proves that no force on earth can bring the Cuban people to its knees as they have risen up to achieve their cause. 
					
					 He noted that the Cuban people would boost the support and cooperation with the Workers' Party, the army and the people of the DPRK led by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He wished the heroic Korean people great success and progress in the New Year.
					
					 The participants went round the photographs showing the achievements made by the Cuban people in the revolutionary struggle and the socialist construction.

articles.title: More Books and CDs Presented to Grand People's Study House
articles.content:
More Books and CDs Presented to Grand People's Study House
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Grand People's Study House has been provided with more books and CDs.
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il recently sent more books and CDs to it.
					
					 He has presented at least 1,000 volumes of books of more than 290 kinds and over 100 CDs to the house in 30 installments this year. 
					
					 Among them are scientific and technological books helpful to accelerating the nation's scientific and technological development and raising the level of knowledge of officials, working people and school youth and children.
					
					 They also include books which help the readers acquire core and basic technology about scientific and technological development in the present times including knowledge about different fields of the national economy, IT, NANO technology and bio-engineering and books that help working people lead a diverse cultural and emotional life and widen their common sense.

articles.title: Masterpieces of Times Created
articles.content:
Masterpieces of Times Created
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Masterpieces showing the might of the Songun era have been created one after another in the musical art world of the DPRK this year, winning great admiration from the people.
					The paean "Song of Loyalty" and other songs of national treasure such as "Motherland, Prosper", "I'll Be the Flower to Herald the Spring", "Desire of Soldier" and "Song of Chollima Forerunner" were given new rendition as masterpieces in a few months on the occasion of the 60th birthday of the DPRK.
					
					 "Unforgettable Echo of Lagoon Samil, Firm Determination", "The Glow over Kangson" and other songs were represented anew as masterpieces of the present century, thus developing the Juche-oriented musical art onto a higher stage. They reflect the revolutionary mettle, militant spirit and noble emotion of the Korean army and people with beautiful and rich artistic delineation.
					
					 This significant year the orchestra and chorus "Snow Falls" was re-represented as a great hit to stir up the hearts of the army and people and the women's trio and mixed chorus "Motherland, Prosper" as a peculiar masterwork of vocal music ensemble to delight all people.
					
					 The musical pieces which were produced to fully meet the requirements of the age both in content and form are demonstrating the validity and vitality of the literary and art policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on developing the musical art as a revolutionary and popular art suitable for the predilection and desire of the people and the demand of the times in reality as well as in name.

articles.title: Building of Economic Power Backed by Science and Technology
articles.content:
Building of Economic Power Backed by Science and Technology
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Sizable achievements have been reported in the DPRK this year in fulfilling militant tasks laid down in the joint New Year editorial which says that science and technology immediately signify an economic power.
					 Aware of the mission assigned to them by the times in finding a shortcut to an economic power, the scientists and technicians of the country have devoted their creative wisdom and patriotic zeal to solving scientific and technological problems arising in its building.
					
					 In this course results of researches in cutting-edge sectors have been introduced and generalized in various domains and a basic space data base loading a huge amount of data has been operated, thus making it possible to undertake scientific researches on a new scientific and technological basis.
					
					 A heat functional chip using nano particles, a new kind of power semiconductor, a bipolar integrated circuit and others have been developed.
					
					 The Juche-oriented iron-making system has been further rounded off, new kinds of metal materials have been developed and applied and researches into an effective use of magnesite abundant in the country have borne fruits to markedly increase the Juche character and independence of the national economy.
					
					 Thanks to the devoted efforts of scientists and technicians, technical reconstruction has progressed in high gear in lots of units including the Taedonggang Battery Factory, the Sariwon Essential Foodstuff Factory and the Chonnaeri Cement Factory.
					
					It must be noted that teachers and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology have successfully finalized nearly 100 major scientific research subjects for dozens of objects of enormous 
					
					 significance in the state.
					
					 A national festival of science and technology, scientific and technological public presentations, exhibitions of scientific and technological achievements and scientific symposiums were held successfully.
					
					Displayed at the 23rd National Festival of Science and Technology were more than 580 items of scientific and technological achievements helpful to lifting the output of mass consumer goods to a high plane and bringing a production upsurge in the vanguard sectors of the national economy and in building materials industry, forestry, etc.
					
					 Korean-style applied programs and quite a few data for introducing IT into production, technology and management were exhibited at the 19th National Software Contest and Exhibition, which gave a vivid view of the ever developing program technology of the country.
					
					 The revolutionary ardor of the scientists, technicians and working people to firmly back the policy of giving importance to science and technology for the prosperity of the nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea was also fully displayed at the 10th National Exhibition of Invention and New Technology to which over 1,500 items of invention and new technology were presented.

articles.title: Lively Response to U.S. Recognition of DPRK as Nuclear Weapons State
articles.content:
Lively Response to U.S. Recognition of DPRK as Nuclear Weapons State
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Official documents recognizing the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state have recently been published in the United States one after another to evoke lively response in the international community.
					 Shortly ago, the U.S. Defense Department issued a report in which it said the rim of the great Asian Continent is already home to five nuclear powers: China, India, Pakistan, the DPRK and Russia. The U.S. defense secretary in an article contributed to a publication recently also made it clear that the DPRK manufactured several nuclear bombs.
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. National Intelligence Committee in a report called "2025 world trend" published recently designated the DPRK as a "nuclear weapons state".
					
					 As regards this, many media of the world gave wide publicity to this, saying that the remarks made by the defense secretary who supervises overall U.S. defense policies making the DPRK's manufacture of nuclear bombs an established fact were not made for the first time nor out of a simple mistake but a conclusion drawn on the basis of comprehensive and thorough analysis made by the U.S. military authorities. They commented that the U.S. seemed to have made a policy switchover in a bid to coexist with the DPRK possessed of nukes with a judgment that it would never abandon its nuclear weapons.
					
					 Foreign press reports predicted that on the basis of recognizing the DPRK's status as a nuclear weapons state the U.S. would seek the nuclear non-proliferation through the improved DPRK-U.S. relations and the six-party talks, too, might switch to nuclear disarmament talks among nuclear weapons states in the future.

articles.title: Intl' Community Urged to Draw Lessons from Worldwide Financial Crisis
articles.content:
Intl' Community Urged to Draw Lessons from Worldwide Financial Crisis
Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The international community is now busy with moves to find a way-out of the worldwide financial crunch that started with the financial crisis in the U.S. and weather it. Facts suggest that the uni-polar system for dominating the financial world by the U.S. dollar is collapsing and there emerges a multi-polar era in the financial world.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					The above-said facts indicate that it is very important to strengthen the independence of national economy and develop economy on the basis of a correct economic theory, and the random introduction of foreign capital may render the national economy bankrupt, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The present situation where the financial crisis is developing into a worldwide economic crisis teaches a lot of lessons.
					
					 Firstly, the Western powers should immediately roll back their foreign policies for aggression as they wantonly violate the sovereignty of other countries and nations.
					
					A currency of a specified country should not be regarded as a main currency but a multilateral currency system should be established and put into force.
					
					 What is also important is to prevent national economy from going bankrupt being embroiled in the vortex of "globalization."
					
					 Another important lesson is that if a country opts for disorderly economic development based on a jungle law, without promoting economic progress based on a correct economic theory and science and technology, it may also suffer from another shocking economic crisis any time.
					
					 The international community is required to make a correct option, drawing a serious lesson from the worldwide financial crisis.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Reinvasion under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Reinvasion under Fire
Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Some days ago former Chief of Staff of the Air Self-Defense Force Tamogami at a recent press conference talked nonsense that it is hardly understandable why the world terms only Japan an aggressor state and Japan was not an aggressor state. He was so adamant as to claim that Japan should have access to nuclear weapons on its own initiative. This guy in a lecture given later asserted it is a wrong view on history to contend that the growing muscle of the SDF would cause trouble to the neighboring countries, complaining about the fact that the SDF is not allowed to exercise "the right to collective self-defense."
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					His militaristic reckless remarks are not subject to any sanctions because he speaks for the Japanese militarists' "painful" feelings and ambition.
					
					The Japanese militaristic forces are prodding such ultra-rightists as Tamogami to kick up a hot wind of militarism in the Japanese society and thus create environment favorable for realizing their wild ambition for reinvasion.
					
					The commentary cites facts that the Japanese militarists have systematically pushed forward the preparations to seek revenge for their past defeat with reinvasion and realize the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" by launching reinvasion.
					
					 It continues:
					
					The world is deeply concerned about the nuclear weaponization stepped up by Japan in a bid to realize the above-said ambition and closely following those moves of the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					 For Japan reinvasion precisely means self-destruction. The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to properly know this and stop running riot.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Defence Minister's Reckless War Hysteria Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Defence Minister's Reckless War Hysteria Flayed
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Ri Sang Hui, puppet minister of Defence of south Korea, addressing a recent session of the  "National Assembly," cried out for "restructuring" the puppet army and "putting it on an ultra-modern and technological basis" and "strengthening the posture of military counter-action," while talking about someone's "contingency."
					He went the lengths of letting loose provocative remarks calling for "measures to cope with conflicts" and staging "exercises for counteraction," taking issue even with the recent just measure taken by the DPRK.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: This lays bare the sinister intention of the Lee Myung Bak group to escalate the moves for a war against the north under the pretext of "coping with conflicts," persistently pursuing its foolish ambition to attack the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					The anti-reunification "policy towards the north" advocated by the Lee group is, in essence, an adventurous and foolish war policy to stifle the DPRK by force of arms in collusion with foreign forces and extend its corrupt "liberal democratic system" to the north, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					The inter-Korean relations once characterized by elated atmosphere of national reconciliation and unity were frozen all of a sudden and the situation on the Korean Peninsula grew so tense that a war may break out there any moment. One of the main reasons was that such wicked bellicose elements as Ri Sang Hui has been hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen and moves to provoke a war, holding important posts in the military.
					
					Such reckless behavior of the traitor should not be overlooked as it is little short of a grave military provocative act to further escalate the moves for a war by zealously taking advantage of the U.S. policy of aggression towards the DPRK and realize his long-cherished wild ambition to invade it.
					
					It is impossible to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve peace and reunification and there is no way to avert a war as long as such confrontational maniacs as Ri Sang Hui are allowed to remain in office. Lee Myung Bak's keeping such warmonger as Ri Sang Hui in his regime is as foolish an act as pricking his own eyes.
					
					Ri Sang Hui will never be able to escape a stern judgment of the history and the nation as he is the arch criminal responsible for pushing the inter-Korean relations to the present tension and to the brink of a war.

articles.title: Representative of DLP Accuses GNP of S. Korea
articles.content:
Representative of DLP Accuses GNP of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Kang Ki Gap, representative of the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea, chided the unpopular moves of the "Grand National Party," according to KBS of south Korea on Dec. 14.
					 He accused the GNP of railroading a "tax reduction bill," etc. through the "National Assembly," thus adding to the assets of a handful of big businesses while causing huge debts to the people.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Protested
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Protested
Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Representatives of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) including O Jae Se, managing director of the Permanent Council of the Korean Federation of Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan visited the Cabinet Office of Japan on December 11 to lodge a protest with the Japanese authorities against the search operation and human rights abuses ceaselessly perpetrated against Chongryon and the federation in pursuit of a sinister political purpose.
					 They handed to it a written request addressed to the prime minister of Japan on behalf of the Korean Federation of Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan, the Tokyo Metropolitan Association of Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan and the Tokyo Metropolitan Shinjuku Association of Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan.
					
					The wholesale search operation the police authorities conducted on the groundless charge of "violation of the law on taxation" on October 29 and November 27 did harm to the dignity of the federation, threatened the rights of Koreans to do business and exist and created unrest in the Japanese society, too, noted the written request.
					
					 It urged the Japanese authorities to stop the unreasonable suppression of Chongryon and the federation and provide the living conditions of the Koreans in Japan and guarantee their rights.
					
					 It also urged the Japanese authorities to implement the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration at an early date and lift the sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 Then, O Jae Se held a press conference at which he referred to the sufferings the members of associations in different parts of Japan are undergoing owing to the politically motivated suppression by the Japanese authorities.
					
					 He demanded the Japanese authorities stop at once the brutal suppression of organizations of Chongryon and immediately release the arrested compatriots.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Mexico and Czech Republic
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Mexico and Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given in Mexico and round-table talks took place in the Czech Republic on Dec. 8 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					The president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism said that Kim Jong Il has trained the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK as an invincible army which no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					 He praised Kim Jong Suk for devotedly protecting President Kim Il Sung and dedicating her all to carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He referred in detail to the originality of the immortal Juche idea and the Songun politics and their great vitality, the advantages of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses and the happy life of the Korean people.
					
					The mayor of Chudlice City of the Czech Republic said that what is most important among the exploits of Kim Jong Suk is that she gave birth to Kim Jong Il and brought him up as a successor to the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige varias unidades de la ciudad de Kanggye
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige varias unidades de la ciudad de Kanggye
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno varias unidades de la ciudad de Kanggye.
					El estuvo primero en el Instituto de Asuntos Electronicos de la Provincia de Jagang construido nuevamente en dicha ciudad.
					
					Recorriendo la exhibicion de los datos del desarrollo de programas y otros lugares, averiguo en detalles el estado de los equipos y de la investigacion.
					
					Al encontrarse con Kim Chol Jin, jefe de la oficina de estudio del sistema donde se desarrollan eficientes programas, y otros tecnicos, hizo conocimiento de la marcha de investigacion.
					
					Satisfecho de que los tecnicos jovenes, graduados de los grupos de talentosos en la computacion de diversas escuelas, ya emergieron como figuras importantes de la rama de industria de informatica, destaco que esta orgullosa realidad es una muestra elocuente de la justeza y la vitalidad de la medida del PTC de intensificar la formacion de los talentosos de computacion.
					
					Para informatizar todas las ramas de la economia nacional, se debe elaborar un correcto plan del desarrollo de la tecnologia informatica e impulsar de continuo esta labor tomandola como el asunto mas importante del Estado, anadio.
					
					Lo fundamental en el desarrollo de programas es crear los programas al estilo coreano, recalco y aclaro la direccion y remedios para este fin.
					
					Para estimular el desarrollo de la tecnologia informatica, es muy importante dar prioridad a la investigacion cientifica, subrayo y agrego que para ello, es preciso engrosar las filas de los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama, elevar rapidamente sus niveles y, en particular, intensificar la formacion de los talentosos de la rama.
					
					Al calificar de muy prometedoras las perspectivas de desarrollo del citado instituto dispuesto de solida base material y personal tecnico, encomendo a todos los empleados que se esfuercen tenazmente por convertir su centro de trabajo en una empresa siempre prospera.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente visito la Biblioteca de la Provincia de Jagang.
					
					Tras recorrer la sala de presentacion del historial, paso por la sala de busqueda de catalogos, la de leccion a traves de la computadora, la de lectura electronica, nuevamente acondicionadas, y otros lugares averiguando las condiciones de equipos y la situacion de administracion.
					
					Al calificar de muy importantes el deber y el papel de la biblioteca en la materializacion de la revolucion tecnica y cultural, presento las tareas para mejorar la utilizacion de ella.
					
					Como resultado del dinamico impulso de la revolucion cultural, el nivel cultural de los trabajadores subio a una etapa alta y crecen cada dia mas sus demandas culturales, senalo y destaco la necesidad de disponer en lo suficiente de los libros y datos de diversos generos para prestarlos a tiempo a los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					La lectura a traves del Network es muy economica y eficiente, a la cual pueden acceder a la vez muchas personas en cualquier lugar, dijo y continuo que se debe impulsar con vistas al futuro el trabajo para ampliar en el futuro el Network hasta a los distritos y comunas.
					
					Por ultimo, dirigio la Fabrica de Medicinas Coryo de Kanggye.
					
					Hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de produccion recorriendo el interior de la fabrica modernizada.
					
					Subrayando que los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la planta posibilitaron magnificamente sobre la base cientifica la produccion en extractos, la esterilizacion y la eliminacion de polvos de las medicinas tradicionales Coryo, aprecio altamente el modo de lucha de ellos que trabajaron con abnegacion para implementar la orientacion del PTC.
					
					Senalo que las medicinas, uno de los recursos principales de curacion y profilaxis, constituyen la importante base material para poner de pleno manifiesto las genuinas ventajas del regimen sanitario socialista de nuestro pais, y destaco la necesidad de enfocar las fuerzas a la produccion farmaceutica para beneficiar en la medida suficiente a los habitantes.
					
					Las medicinas Coryo se usan ampliamente desde remota antiguedad en nuestro pais por sus buenos efectos, dijo y continuo que el desarrollo de ellas resulta muy importante para el fomento de la salud del pueblo.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica crearan incesantes milagros y meritos en la produccion farmaceutica, bien conscientes de que son funvionarios sanitarios en el honroso puesto para proteger la vida del ser humano y fomentar su salud.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang, Pak To Chun, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, el primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang, y los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe carta de ano nuevo de Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe carta de ano nuevo de Hu Jintao
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio la carta de ano nuevo que le dirigiera el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y presidente de la Republica Popular China, Hu Jintao, en ocasion del Ano Nuevo del 98 (2009) de la Era Juche.
					El embajador chino en Corea, Liu Xiaoming, la entrego el dia 16 al secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok.

articles.title: Repercuten documentos oficiales de EE.UU. relativos a la RPDC
articles.content:
Repercuten documentos oficiales de EE.UU. relativos a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, producen grandes repercusiones en la sociedad internacional los documentos oficiales de Estados Unidos publicados uno tras otro reconociendo a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como poseedora de armas nucleares.
					Hace poco, el Departamento de Defensa norteamericano hizo publico su informe anotando a la RPDC como uno de los cinco paises poseedores de armas nucleares del continente asiatico.
					
					Seguidamente, el secretario de esa cartera apunto en su tesis colaborada en una publicacion que "Corea fabrico varias bombas nucleares".
					
					Por otra parte, hizo lo mismo el Comite de Inteligencia Nacional Norteamericano en su informe perspectivo intitulado "Tendencia del mundo hasta 2025" dado a la publicidad recientemente.
					
					Al respecto, las agencias noticieras, periodicos y radios de numerosos paises del mundo trascendieron ampliamente que "es la primera vez que el secretario de Defensa, encargado general de la politica de defensa norteamericana, se refiriera a la fabricacion de bombas atomicas por Corea tomandola por un hecho consumado" y que "esto no se trata de un simple error sino puede ser la conclusion sacada segun el analisis general y consecuente de las autoridades militares norteamericanas".
					
					Parece que EE.UU. cambio su politica en direccion de coexistir con la RPDC portadora del arma nuclear juzgando que ella no renunciaria jamas a este artefacto, comentaron.
					
					Es posible que EE.UU. persiga en el futuro la no proliferacion nuclear a traves del mejoramiento de las relaciones con la RPDC a base del reconocimiento de tal status de ella y convierta las conversaciones a 6 bandas en un encuentro para el desarme nuclear entre los paises portadores de armas nucleares, pronosticaron las fuentes extranjeras.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena intencion de nueva agresion de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena intencion de nueva agresion de Japon
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En la  reciente rueda de prensa, el ex-jefe del Estado Mayor de las "Fuerzas Aereas de Autodefensa" de Japon, Tamogami, dijo que no entiende por que el mundo califica unicamente a Japon de Estado agresor aunque realmente no lo es e insistio abiertamente en que su pais debe poseer con iniciativa las armas nucleares.
					En la seguida conferencia refunfuno que no se permite el ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva" a las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" y disparateo que tienen erronea concepcion de la historia los que piensan que el incremento del poderio de estas fuerzas armadas perjudicara a los paises circunvecinos.
					
					En un comentario individual divulgado este miercoles, el periodico Rodong Sinmun senala que tales disparates militaristas de Tamogami no son sancionados por nada porque el representa el sentimiento y ambicion venenosos de los militaristas japoneses.
					
					Continua que las fuerzas militaristas japonesas tratan de utilizar a los elementos ultraderechistas como Tamogami para dar un clima favorable a la nueva agresion levantando la ola militarista en la sociedad japonesa.
					
					El comentarista revelo con datos que los militaristas japoneses vinieron preparandose sistematicamente para tomar la venganza de su derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial y realizar su viejo sueno de la "Esfera de coprosperidad de gran Asia oriental" mediante la nueva agresion al continente asiatico.
					
					 El mundo esta profundamente preocupado por el armamentismo nuclear de Japon, Estado agresor paranoico por establecer la "Esfera de coprosperidad de gran Asia oriental", y vigila agudamente sus maniobras para la nueva invasion, advirtio.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben actuar con prudencia teniendo bien presente que la nueva agresion les resultara un acto suicida, concluyo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena palabras belicosas de Ri Sang Hui
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena palabras belicosas de Ri Sang Hui
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el ministro de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea, Ri Sang Hui, connotado maniaco de confrontacion y guerra contra el Norte de Corea, hablo tanto en la "Asamblea Nacional" de la supuesta "situacion bruscamente cambiada" de alguien insistiendo en la necesidad de la "reforma estructural, la ultra-modernizacion y la tecnificacion" del ejercito titere surcoreano y del "fortalecimiento de la disposicion militar".
					Ademas, mientras censuraba la justa medida tomada recientemente por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hablo de que se debe "prepararse para los eventuales conflictos" y "realizar los ejercicios correspondientes"
					
					Esto demuestra claramente el malvado intento de la banda de Lee Myung Bak de recrudecer su campana para provocar la guerra de agresion a la RPDC bajo el pretexto de "prepararse para el conflicto" persiguiendo obstinadamente su absurda ambicion de atropellarla por via militar.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 17 y continua:
					
					La "politica sobre el Norte" de caracter anti-reunificacion de la banda de Lee es en su esencia la absurda y aventurera politica belica para aplastar militarmente a la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas y establecer hasta en ella el corrupto "sistema democratico liberal" del Sur de Corea.
					
					Las relaciones Norte-Sur, que se calentaban por el animo de la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, fueron congeladas de repente y se creo una situacion muy tirante en la Peninsula Coreana que puede dar paso a la guerra en cualquier momento.
					
					Todo esto se debe a los connotados belicistas como Ri Sang Hui, que maniobran locamente para el enfrentamiento fratricida y la provocacion de guerra ocupando importantes cargos del circulo militar.
					
					 No se puede tolerar jamas el comportamiento del traidor Ri que significa grave acto de provocacion militar para realizar a toda costa la anejada y ansiada ambicion de agredir al Norte al intensificar las maniobras de provocacion de guerra en contubernio con EE.UU.
					
					Si se deja intacto a ese maniaco de confrontacion, no se lograran jamas la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur ni la reunificacion pacifica y, al contrario, se desatara la guerra.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak esta buscandose desgracias abrigando a ese belicista.
					
					El traidor Ri Sang Hui, que exacerbo la tension en las relaciones Norte-Sur y las llevo a la coyuntura de guerra como hoy, no podra evadir jamas la severa sentencia de la historia y la nacion.
